original_text: You should have obeyed my commands. Then you would have had peace in your lives, like a river that runs quietly. You would have been safe and well, like the strong waves in the sea. You should have obeyed my commands. Then you would have had peace in your lives, like a river that runs quietly. You would have been safe and well, like the strong waves in the sea. You should have obeyed my commands. Then you would have had peace in your lives, like a river that runs quietly. You would have been safe and well, like the strong waves in the sea. You should have obeyed my commands.
korean_text: 네가 나의 명령에 주의하였더라면 네 평강이 강과 같았겠고 네 공의가 바다 물결 같았을 것이며

sentences.original_text: You should have obeyed my commands.
Then you would have had peace in your lives,
sentences.korean_translation: 그러면 네 삶에 평안이 있었을 것이다.
